definition: of or relating to the arts and manners that a group favors
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the arts and manners that a group favors
= example: of or relating to the arts and manners that a group favors
- denoting or deriving from or distinctive of the ways of living built up by a group of people
= example: denoting or deriving from or distinctive of the ways of living built up by a group of people
= synonyms: ethnic
- relating to the raising of plants or animals
= example: relating to the raising of plants or animals
- of or relating to the shared knowledge and values of a society
= example: of or relating to the shared knowledge and values of a society
